title: My attempt to draw Lux
body:
https://i.imgur.com/FMz4b7T.png[]

EDIT:

Here is an updated version. Someone on Reddit pointed out that the poster was too bright and detailed given the otherwise simple background, which was very true. So I pixilated the poster and lowered it's opacity to 80%. 

https://i.imgur.com/ld7yaMN.png[]
